location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.650 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Acknowledgement of Kemball's earlier letter (ff 238-39), informing him that the Governor in Council has no objection to the alterations he has recommended to the Arabic version of the notification. Malet continues the Governor in Council authorises Kemball to amend his copies of the notification for distribution.
